rooms.name: Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: An open-plan living space that integrates both dining and social interaction areas. Floor-to-ceiling windows are used to maximize natural light and create a seamless indoor-outdoor connection. The space is designed in an Art Deco style, featuring geometric patterns and elegant detailing.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern open-plan kitchen with integrated appliances, sleek cabinetry, and contemporary fixtures that complement the overall Art Deco aesthetic. Ample counter space and storage solutions are incorporated.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom designed for comfort with elegant decor inspired by Art Deco. Incorporates a north-facing orientation to align with Vastu principles, ensuring positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-appointed bathroom integrated near the master bedroom for privacy and convenience. Features modern fixtures while adhering to local building norms.

openings.description: A primary entrance facing north, providing ample natural light while aligning with Vastu principles and enhancing the flow of positive energy into the home.
Floor-to-ceiling windows integrated in living areas to maximize daylight and enhance visual appeal.
